short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create outfits easier by freely arranging items on boards. Not affiliated with farfetch.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add items from the farfetch.com to boards where you can freely arrange them and create awesome outfits.

Items can be added from the standard farfetch product list, but also from the individual product page. Just click on the "B" button next to the item to add it to your currently selected board.

You can have as many boards as you want and there is no limit for a board's size.

From a board you can easily access a particular product's page by clicking on the brand name.

Boards can be exported as images that you can save on your computer and share on social media.
